players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob was killed last night, which means the mafia is active. I want to hear from everyone about their suspicions or any information they might have to help us find the killer."
Diana: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to vote her out now before she kills again."
You: "Alice is not the mafia! Diana's accusation is baseless and clearly an attempt to mislead us. Why would the mafia reveal themselves so openly? I suspect Diana is trying to frame me."
Charlie: "I believe Diana's claim as the detective. We should vote for Alice to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice is desperate and trying to turn us against me because she knows she's exposed. Charlie and I agree—voting Alice is our best chance to stop the mafia now."

players.name: Diana
